top.title: Trump threatens Canada with 100% tariffs over China trade deal
top.summary: Trump made the threat in a social media post as tensions rise between the US and its northern neighbour.

top.title: Two days of peace talks end as Russia continues Ukraine attacks
top.summary: There is no apparent breakthrough as the three-way talks conclude and Russia maintains its bombardment.

top.title: How Soviet urban planning is helping Russia freeze Ukraine
top.summary: Thousands of people are affected when heating plants are targeted by Russian forces.

top.title: What does a new US TikTok deal mean for users?
top.summary: While TikTok's future in the US has been secured, questions remain about exactly what changes US users will see.

top.title: Is China quietly winning the AI race?
top.summary: The BBC's Lily Jamali looks into why big US firms and start-ups alike are turning to Chinese tech.

top.title: Ubisoft cancels six games including Prince of Persia and closes studios
top.summary: The studio, known for Assassin's Creed and Just Dance, is also delaying seven titles in a restructure.
